task.title: Installing resource adapter on
task.shortdesc: Install the adapter into and make the resource adapter available to applications.

prereq.p: The resource adapter is available as part of the JMS client download. The JMS client can be obtained from the page on developerWorks.

taskbody.context: Complete the following steps to install the adapter into and make the resource adapter (ima.jmsra.rar file) available to applications.

step.cmd: From the administrative console, select Resources > Resource Adapters > Resource adapters, and select the appropriate scope for your configuration.
step.info: Scope specifies the level at which the resource definition is visible.

step.cmd: Click Install RAR to install a new resource adapter.
Enter the path to the ima.jmsra.rar file. You can either upload a ima.jmsra.rar file from the local file system or specify an existing ima.jmsra.rar file on any of the nodes in your cell context.
Select the node where you want to install the ima.jmsra.rar file. You must install the file on each node separately.
The Configuration window for the resource adapter that is selected opens. The Configuration window shows information that is gathered from the deployment descriptor.
Synchronize the nodes if appropriate for your environment.
